evidence.claim: M4 Solutions utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure and services.
The company has a focus on HIPAA compliance for health tech solutions.
Documentation mentions integration patterns such as RESTful APIs and GraphQL APIs for application connectivity.
They mention using Amazon RDS for database management.
M4 Solutions incorporates cloud storage solutions with Amazon S3.

icp.icp_reason: No relevant use cases or evidence of X12 processing found on the website.
